questions.question: Pipe labels shall be located at intervals of not more than _____ ft.
The standard operating pressure for a nitrogen system is _______, and the correct background label color is _________.
Station outlets and inlets shall be identified as to the name or ___________Â  for the specific medical gas or vacuum provided.
___________________ systems that are breached, including additions, renovations, and replacements, shall be inspected and tested.
options: Oxygen, medical air, and nitrous oxide

questions.question: Breached portions of the systems subject to inspection and testing shall be confined to only the specific altered zone that is located __________ for vacuum systems, and ___________ for pressure gases at the point of___________.
Where positive pressure gas piping systems operate at pressures other than the standard gauge pressure, the ______________ shall be added to labeling.
To identify medical gas or vacuum system piping, the piping shall be labeled by_________________.

Inspection and testing shall be performed on all new piped gas systems, additions, renovations, temporary installations or repaired systems, to assure the facility that all applicable provisions of NFPA 99 have been adhered to, and system integrity has been achieved or maintained. What is required of the individual doing the testing or inspecting?

Breached portions of the systems subject to inspection and testing shall be confined to only the specific altered zone, or area that is downstream for pressure gases at the point of intrusion. Where shall a system be declared breached?
Medical gas piping is permitted to be painted.
Installers for medical gas systems must be qualified to ASSE _______.
An installer with an ASSE 6010 credential shall not use their certification to oversee installation by non-certified personnel.
Medical gas system inspections shall be performed by an individual meeting the requirements of __________
Medical gas verification testing must be performed by an individual meeting the requirements of _________
Inspections are permitted to be performed by the installing contractor.
